string.value: [Note] Beware of fraudulent messages that offer a gift, requesting you to enter a confirmation number.
[Note] Beware of fraudulent messages that offer an item for a survey, requesting you to enter the confirmation number
[Note] Beware of fraudulent messages that present you with an offer to charge your cash, requesting sensitive information.
[Notice] Use Party Search to easily find other players.
[Notice] You can allow/disable Party Invitations in the Options screen.
[Notice] A Maple Administrator will never ask for personal information, game items, etc. Please careful of scammers claiming to be Maple Administrators. They're not!
[Notice] Anyone that falsely claims to be or acts like a Maple Administrator will be banned from the game.
[Notice] Beware of scams involving the sales of mesos, game items, hacking programs, etc..
[Notice] Any mesos or items lost because of illegal cash transactions will not be restored.
[Notice] Anyone that attempts to conduct or successfully conducts an illegal transaction involving the sale of mesos, game items, hack programs, etc. will be banned from the game.\r\n
[Notice] Giving mesos or items through games of chance is gambling and violates the ToS.
[Notice] All acts of gambling violate the ToS, and may result in your Maple ID being restricted.
[Notice] Gambling is disruptive to the game environment.
[Notice] Exchanging game assets for cash or other compensation is a violation of the ToS and could result in a ban.
[Notice] Leaking or using other people's information violates the ToS and could result in a ban.
[Notice] Beware of scams using Delivery Packages for 1:1 trades.
[Notice] Always double-check your trade before pressing the Trade button.
[Announcement] Please be aware that malicious (hacking) programs can be installed on the computer when others control your computer remotely through a messenger.
[Announcement] You could be restricted if another person others control your computer remotely and installs a malicious (hacking) program.
